description: '''Spanish traditional Christian music''' refers to [[Spanish language|Spanish-language]] [[Christian music]] that is usually accompanied by traditional instruments such as the piano, organ, violin, or guitar. Christian or Baptist [[rondalla]]s are normally the interpreters of this kind of music, though soloists, duos, trios, and groups sing it also. This kind of music is generally released through [[Compact Cassette]]s and [[Compact Disc]]s from Baptist churches or from other Christian music institutions. Spanish Traditional Christian music has been made popular in both Mexico and the United States and it has been recently distributed through [[iTunes]] also.
